Cultural Adaptability: +1 Ancestry feat/Has Adopted Ancestry feature
Fighter Feats: 1 selections
Adopted Ancestry: May take ancestry feats from chosen ancestry
Halfling Luck: May reroll a skill check or save 1/dy
Wildwood Halfling: May move normally through foliage difficult terrain
Perception: +8 (wisdom; expert)

Skill Notes:
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 3 from any)
Halfling Lore: Skill Trained (Acrobatics; Stealth; Halfling Lore)
Distracting Shadows: May use larger creatures as cover for Hide and Sneak
Guiding Luck: May reroll a failed Perception check or attack roll 1/dy
Keen Eyes: R30' +2 Seek to find hidden creatures
Student Of The Canon: All critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Cannot fail to Recall Knowledge about own faith
Sure Feet: Successes on Acrobatics to Balance and Athletics to Climb are critical successes/Does not suffer flat-footed during Balance or Climb
Watchful Halfling: +2 Perception (sense enchantment)/Gains an automatic -2 check to note enchantment
Combat
Hit Points: 16 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Fighter: 17
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Halfling Weapon Expertise: Weapon Expert (Sling; Halfling Sling; Shortsword; Halfling Weapons)
Halfling Weapon Familiarity: Weapon Trained (Sling; Halfling Sling Staff; Shortsword)
Attack Of Opportunity: May use a Reaction to Strike a foe that uses a manipulate action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square while moving
Ceaseless Shadows: May use Hide and Sneak without cover and gain additional cover from creatures
Halfling Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon halfling weapons/Treats halfling weapons as one category lower
Halfling Weapon Trickster: Critical hits with a shortsword, sling, or halfling weapon weapon inflict critical specialization effect
Hillock Halfling: Regains +1 HP from rest or treatment
Keen Eyes: DC 3/9 to target a concealed/hidden foe
Point-Blank Shot: Suffers no volley penalty from ranged volley weapon/+2 attack at close range with ranged non-volley weapon
Shield Block: Shield negates damage up to its hardness and absorbs half of remaining damage
Titan Slinger: +1 damage die step on slings vs. Large and larger foes
Twilight Halfling: Has Low-Light Vision feature
Unfettered Halfling: Successes to Escape and vs. grabbed or restrained are critical successes/Foe Grapple fails are critical fails/Foe Grab requires a successful Athletics check
Watchful Halfling: May use Aid to overcome enchantment
Save: Fortitude: +5 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +9 (dexterity; expert); Will: +6 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Gutsy Halfling: Successful saves vs. emotion are critical successes
Irrepressible: Successful saves vs. emotion are critical successes, and critical failures are normal failures
Notes
Validation Errors:

Ceaseless Shadows Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13 and distracting shadows feature (currently 1)
